data.title: Frequently Asked Questions
data.meta_description: All your frequently asked questions answered here. Opening times, online availability, food service times, private parties and more.
data.text:
We offer monetary vouchers, as well as lunch, dinner and treatment vouchers. These can be purchased here.

Please kindly note that you are unable to redeem a Gift Voucher online to make a booking. Please book your room as normal and the team will refund any pre-payments with proof of your voucher. Please just contact reservations@thepighotel.com

​

The availability for each PIG shown online is live and totally up-to-date. If you can’t find the date you’re after, please email reservations@thepighotel.com so we can add you to our waiting list.

However, if you can be flexible, do check availability at our other PIGs as we may have a room or table available elsewhere.

We are delighted you have chosen to visit and look forward to welcoming you!

Your table and our team will be ready for you to sit down and dine at your chosen time. If you would like a drink in the bar prior to dining, please arrive at least 30 minutes beforehand.

Should you need to cancel or amend your reservation please contact us on 0345 225 9494 at least 24 hours prior to your booking. If you are celebrating or are just looking to add a few extra touches then please let us know in advance and we will be delighted to help make arrangements for you.

Please visit your chosen PIGs webpage for sample menus, directions and what to do when in the area. Please let us know if we can be of any further assistance.

Unless we are running a special deal and it is stated within the terms, all of our rates are on a room only basis so are inclusive of VAT only.

Breakfast is served in the restaurant where you can choose to either dig into our PIG grazing breakfast tables or pick something hot from our breakfast menus. Prices range from £16.95-£20.95.

If you have booked onto a dinner, bed and breakfast offer, your breakfast will be included in your booking with no additional cost.

Breakfast at THE PIG-in the wall is served in the deli bar.

If you are joining us for a treatment in one of our Potting Sheds or Sheep Huts, here is everything you need to know before relaxing with us:

We want to reassure you that we have put measures in place to keep you and our teams safe so that you can confidently enjoy a relaxing treatment with us. We see this as a partnership of trust, so we ask you to please play your part in keeping everyone safe. In return, we will all be doing the same for you.

Our therapists have received additional training on health and safety protocol and have been provided with additional safety equipment to wear during all appointments.

Our Potting Sheds and Sheep Huts are signposted for you, therefore, please arrive in good time ready for your treatment. If it is raining please feel free to wait on the bench/under the bus shelter outside the Potting Sheds/Sheep Huts and your therapist will come and collect you.

Should you need to cancel or amend your reservation please contact us at least 72 hours prior to your booking to avoid a charge in full for the treatment.

If you require any further information please do not hesitate to ask.

You can check in from 4pm at all of our properties, however, you’re more than welcome to arrive earlier to drop off your luggage and explore the gardens. The team will be on hand to help you when you arrive.

Check out is by 11am. We ask that you leave your room by this time, but please enjoy the surroundings all day. We can’t guarantee an early check-in or late check-out, but stick around and let us know your plans and we will try our best on the day.

THE PIG welcomes well-behaved dogs to stay in a small number of rooms across most of our hotels, excluding THE PIG-in the wall and THE PIG-on the beach*. We kindly ask owners to help us respect the sensitivities of all our guests and staff by asking you to follow our Dog House Rules to avoid ending up in the doghouse! To book a dog friendly room please email us at reservations@thepighotel.com or give us a call

We do not permit dogs inside the restaurants, although they are welcome to join you on a stroll around the grounds or for outdoor dining. Please note at THE PIG-in the wall we only permit guide dogs into the property.
